subject: order not shiping
description_text: Dear, I'm interested in what's happening with my order. I ordered pedals on 12/25/2025 and when I go to your link it only says confirmed and not sent, the order number is SSN5275

conversations.body_text: Hi Marko Krsmanovic,    We apologize for the delay in shipping your order. Here is your tracking link.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=ALS01360071879
